definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: However , I am also crazy about Pili Hand Puppet Shows.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我也疯狂于霹雳布袋戏。

sentences.english: Glove puppetry is significant to Taiwanese culture because it combines so many things.
sentences.chinese: 布袋戏对于台湾文化非常重要，因为它融合多种元素。

sentences.english: The most famous figure in the history of Taiwanese glove puppetry was Lee Tien -Lu.
sentences.chinese: 李天禄是台湾布袋戏史最负盛名的人物。

sentences.english: Lin said the puppet show is to greet the gods in thank God activities and birthday party oriented.
sentences.chinese: 林老师表示布袋戏在近代演出以迎神谢神和祝寿为主。

definition: type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
Gaojia opera of Fujian and Taiwan
see 布袋戲|布袋戏[bu4 dai4 xi4]
variety of opera popular in southern Fujian and Taiwan
storytelling dramatic art dating back to Song and Yuan periods, single narrator without music, often historical topics with commentary
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
